text: A few days after the "part-time job" with Sakura.

name: Me
text: (Hmm, what's the meaning of this...?)
The machines lined up all over the room looked complex.
I picked up one of them and repeatedly tilted my head in contemplation.

name: Me
text: (This is the "cargo" that Faust and her gang were trying to transport with such great care...?)
After defeating Faust and her crew, who had tried to kill us to keep us quiet, only this "cargo" had been left in our hands.
We had brought it back to my house for now since we couldn't just leave it there, and now I was trying to analyze it.

name: Me
text: (It kind of looks like part of a drone weapon, but not at all like ones I've seen before. Maybe it's state-of-the-art...?)

name: Me
text: (State-of-the-art... no, it might also be the exact opposite.)
I didn't know the particulars, but looking at the mechanisms one by one, they seemed to be old-fashioned and out-of-date.
In other words, it was junk.
I mean, it wasn't completely worthless, but I couldn't possibly imagine it was something you'd assign escort duty for when transporting.

name: Me
text: (On top of that, the destination had been a baby goods company without any ties to the underworld. After all of this, there are still too many things that don't add up.)

name: Me
text: (Don't tell me, there's more to that incident than meets the eye...?)
*Pipipipi*...

name: Me
text: Hm? A phone call? Who is it...?
It was a call from an unfamiliar number.

name: Me
text: ーHello?

name: Masked Madam
text: It's been a while, Captain. Do you know who I am?

name: Me
text: Youー!?
There was no way I wouldn't recognize that voice. The incident from a while ago reappeared in my mind.
In exchange for Kiryu Sabato's information, we had we had gotten stuck with breaking into a secret UFS facility. Come to think of it, that had been the first mission of our Independent Commando Unit.

name: Me
text: The masked lady from back then? You helped us with the Kiryu case.

name: Me
text: I guess I don't have to ask how you got this number.
This woman was working as an information broker. Finding out a phone number was a piece of cake for her.

name: Masked Madam
text: Yes. And I think there's something else you should be asking right now.

name: Me
text: What do you want? Why did someone like you go to the trouble of contacting me?

name: Masked Madam
text: Hehe... it's about some "cargo" you brought back with you. Does that ring a bell...?

name: Me
text: What...?
I looked at the machines lined up in the room.

name: Me
text: ...It's like you can see in here. Do you know what this junk is?

name: Me
text: (The masked lady belongs to some kind of UFS organization. She must've heard about the escort mission somewhere...)

name: Masked Madam
text: Oh my, so you already noticed. What you guys transported was just junkー

name: Masked Madam
text: In other words, a diversion. The "client" was after something else.

name: Me
text: Something else?

name: Masked Madam
text: Yes.

name: Masked Madam
text: Shall we meet and talk about the details in person? I also have a job for you.

name: Me
text: A job? Hold on a sec. I'm not a handyman.

name: Masked Madam
text: Hehe, I'm sure you'll take this job as soon as you hear the name of the "client."

name: Me
text: What do you...?
On the other end of the phone, I could hear the woman take a small breath.

name: Masked Madam
text: The name of the "client" is Nisha Gaizaー

name: Masked Madam
text: So? Are you ready to hear me out?
The next night.
I had arrived in Tokyo Kingdom with Shikanosuke and Hebiko.

name: Uehara Shikanosuke
text: T-Tokyo Kingdom. This place looks as bad as ever. Let's just get this over with and go home...
Shikanosuke was looking around while trembling as always. It was understandable.
Tokyo Kingdom was an abandoned artificial island. A city of depravity and pleasure was growing wild there.
The entire island was slums and red-light districts. It was a lawless area dominated by criminals and residents of the underworld, and nothing good would come from setting foot there.

name: Me
text: Don't get lost, Shikanosuke. If the bad guys kidnap you, you'll never be able to come back.

name: Shikanosuke
text: D-Don't say stuff like that!

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: But what is Gaiza-chan planning to do in a dangerous place like this?

name: Me
text: Who knows... I don't know any more than I just explained to you.
I had explained the most important points to the two of them, about the "cargo" and about the "client."

name: Me
text: We're talking about Gaiza. It's definitely going to be something stupid.

name: Hebiko
text: Don't say stuff like that, Fuma-chan. Gaiza-chan might have his reasons.

name: Me
text: He's the one who started a rebellion for the "revival of the Fuma Clan" or something like that. What kind of reasons could there be...?

name: Hebiko
text: H-Hebiko isn't sure, but... Gaiza-chan has been a fellow student since you were little, right?

name: Hebiko
text: Hebiko just thinks it's a little cold, Fuma-chan, to speak ill of someone while you don't know anything.

name: Me
text: You say "fellow"... He tried to kill me, you know...

name: Me
text: (Hebiko is kind of confrontational today...)
Was she in a bad mood? As I was puzzled over that, Shikanosuke looked at me with a smirk.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hehe~ Don't you get it, Fuma? Hebiko is sulking. Because the party to celebrate her leaving the hospital got canceled.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, ah, hey! Shikanosuke-chan!

name: Me
text: Ahhhh...
So that's what this was about.
Originally, we were supposed to be celebrating Hebiko's discharge from the hospital today.
But unfortunately the appointment with the masked lady had fallen on the same day, so we had no choice but to do it another time.

name: Me
text: Is that why, Hebiko? Are you sulking because we couldn't celebrate your release from the hospital?

name: Hebiko
text: Th-That's not true!!

name: Hebiko
text: Hebiko is not a child who'd sulk about something like that! Don't say anything weird!

name: Shikanosuke
text: But you were talking about what we are going to eat tomorrow and about how you are looking forward to it, weren't you?

name: Hebiko
text: Shikanosuke-chan~~~~
Hebiko pulled Shikanosuke's cheeks and stretched them, making him look like a frog.

name: Me
text: In that case, let's go somewhere after we're finished. Since we came all the way here from Gosha.

name: Hebiko
text: Eh? Is that okay, Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: I don't know if it's okay yet, but... I guess it'll work out somehow. Today we're just going to listen to what she has to say anyways.
It shouldn't be too much trouble... at least I hoped so.

name: Hebiko
text: Oohoho, right, right! If Fuma-chan insists, then Hebiko can go along too!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yeah! I guess it can't be helped! I'll go with you too!

name: Me
text: ...As if it wasn't all in your own interest...

name: Me
text: (Still, better for things to be cheery than gloomy. Let's get this over with quickly.)

name: Shikanosuke
text: H-Hey, Fuma...

name: Me
text: Yeah...

name: Shikanosuke
text: I know Tokyo Kingdom is supposed to have bad air, but...

name: Me
text: Yeah...

name: Shikanosuke
text: But still, no matter how you look at it, isn't this strange...?

name: Me
text: Yeah...
A white fog suddenly surged up around us... or was it smoke? In any case, the whole street was shrouded in some kind of white gas.

name: Shikanosuke
text: I can't even see your face anymore, Fuma!!

name: Me
text: Yeah, be careful! Don't breathe in the fog unnecessarilyー
And at that momentー
Kyaaaaaaahhh!!?
Don't come near me!! Don't come over heeeeere!!!
Damn it!! Go to hell, you monster!!
The whole place was in an uproar. Screams, the sound of something breaking, and even gunshots could be heard.
We kept our heads down and exchanged confused looks of "What the heck is this?"

name: Shikanosuke
text: F-Fuma... should we... really keep going?

name: Me
text: Yeah, I'm not sure... Hebiko, can you sense something?

name: Hebiko
text: Wait a second...
Hebiko turned into an octopus and twitched her suckers. The suckers on her octopus tentacles had a sophisticated sense of smell and could act like sensors.

name: Hebiko
text: Hmmm...

name: Hebiko
text: It smells weird and Hebiko isn't sure what it is, but... this smoke gives off really bad vibes...

name: Me
text: Bad vibes...?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aieeee!! Hebiko's hunches are really good!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hey, Fuma!! Let's run aw-... no, let's withdraw for a moment!!
Shikanosuke seemed to have gotten scared and tried to run away in panic.

name: Me
text: Wait! Don't run! If you run with no vision like this...
*THUD!!*

name: Shikanosuke
text: Ahh!? S-Sorry!!
As expected, Shikanosuke had bumped into someone in front of him and fallen to the ground.

name: Me
text: I told you so! Calm down a little bit. I'm sorry, this guy's freaking out.
I spoke to the figure in front of us. Howeverー

name: Figure
text: MRUNGHH...?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Huh...?
The person emerging from the haze had bluish-black discolored skin and gave off a nose-piercing stench...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aieeeeeeeeeeeeee!! It's a Zombiiiiieeeeeeeee!!

name: Me
text: Shikanosuke, you moron!! Don't provoke it!! Ahh, too lateー

name: Zombie
text: MRUUUUUUUUUUUNNNGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHH!!!
In response to my and Shikanosuke's shouting, the Zombie cried out.

name: Hebiko
text: F-Fuma-chan! They're also behindー
Before we noticed it, the silhouettes of several Zombies had appeared around us.

name: Zombie Gangster Girl
text: MOOUNGHH...

name: Zombie
text: MRUUNGGHH...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Fuma, what do we doooo!?

name: Me
text: No matter what I say we have no choice but to do this!! ーHebiko!

name: Hebiko
text: Got it, there's no other way!

name: Zombie
text: MRUNGGGHHHH!!!!!!!

name: Zombie Gangster Girl
text: MOUNNGGGGHHH!!!!!!
